58613734-ab54-47cf-9b97-c37f85194c0c.content:
SESSION PROGRESS: Decorator Application Complete

Key achievements:
1. Applied @eidosian decorators to 298 Python files across all forges
2. Fixed import ordering issues (__future__ imports must be first)
3. Fixed malformed multi-line imports where decorator script inserted incorrectly
4. Fixed property setter/deleter conflicts (skip these in decorator applicator)
5. Removed self-decoration from eidosian_core (circular import issue)
6. All forges pass syntax check

Test status:
- memory_forge: 13/13 passed
- glyph_forge: 171/171 passed
- figlet_forge: Core rendering works, compat tests outdated
- word_forge: Syntax OK, tests slow but import works

Forge analysis findings:
- ollama_forge and llm_forge have overlapping LLM client functionality
- code_forge and refactor_forge have distinct but related code analysis
- memory_forge and knowledge_forge connected via KnowledgeMemoryBridge

The @eidosian decorator now provides logging, profiling, benchmarking, and tracing.
